meanings.sent1: She restyles her hair every morning before school.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer restyles old clothes to make them trendy again.
meanings.sent3: He restyles his room with colorful posters and new furniture.
meanings.sent4: The artist restyles reality into dreamlike landscapes on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The chef restyles traditional recipes with modern twists for his restaurant.

meanings.definition: To give a new style to something.
meanings.sent1: The interior decorator restyles the living room with elegant furniture.
meanings.sent2: She restyles her wardrobe every season to keep up with the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: The magician restyles his classic tricks with a modern flair.
meanings.sent4: The architect restyles the old building into a modern masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist restyles her client's hair for a fresh new look.

meanings.definition: To change the style of something.
meanings.sent1: The graphic designer restyles the company logo for a more modern look.
meanings.sent2: She restyles the garden by adding new plants and decorations.
meanings.sent3: The tailor restyles the old dress into a fashionable new outfit.
meanings.sent4: The director restyles the play to give it a contemporary twist.
meanings.sent5: The artist restyles the painting by adding vibrant colors and bold strokes.
